titleStmt.title: A supplement, 1689 to a former treatise concerning the East-India trade, printed 1681.
titleStmt.author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699.
Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699. Treatise wherein is demonstrated I. That the East India trade is the most national of all foreign trades.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Sir Josiah Child. cf. NUC pre-1956.
This is a supplement to the East-India trade treaty of 1681.
